original_text: And his father had not displeased him at any time in saying, Why hast thou done so? and he also was a very goodly man; and his mother bare him after Absalom.
korean_text: 그는 압살롬 다음에 태어난 자요 용모가 심히 준수한 자라 그의 아버지가 네가 어찌하여 그리 하였느냐고 하는 말로 한 번도 그를 섭섭하게 한 일이 없었더라

sentences.original_text: And his father had not displeased him at any time
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지는 언제든지 그를 불쾌하게 하지 않았으며

sentences.original_text: in saying, Why hast thou done so?
and he also was a very goodly man
and his mother bare him after Absalom.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 어머니는 압살롬 뒤에 그를 낳았더라
